text.text: The fully owned Shillington Copper Property falls north of Castle East, near Gowganda, Ontario. The property has the potential to become a valuable copper exploration asset given the current market demand.

The 2190-hectare property was acquired in 2020 to expand the land package and exploration potential north of Castle East given the geology and controlling structures nearby. The Company completed a ground-truthing and prospecting program in 2021 over a 2 square kilometre area and identified strong mineralization from grab and outcrop samples. A future exploration program is planned to define the extent of this potential high-grade copper mineralised area.
